canceltask.name: CancelTask
canceltask.description: Grants permission to cancel tasks on remote devices

createtask.name: CreateTask
createtask.description: Grants permission to create tasks on remote devices

describedevice.name: DescribeDevice
describedevice.description: Grants permission to describe a remotely-managed device

describedeviceec2instances.name: DescribeDeviceEc2Instances
describedeviceec2instances.description: Grants permission to describe a remotely-managed device's EC2 instances

describeexecution.name: DescribeExecution
describeexecution.description: Grants permission to describe task executions

describetask.name: DescribeTask
describetask.description: Grants permission to describe a task

listdeviceresources.name: ListDeviceResources
listdeviceresources.description: Grants permission to list a remotely-managed device's resources

listdevices.name: ListDevices
listdevices.description: Grants permission to list remotely-managed devices

listexecutions.name: ListExecutions
listexecutions.description: Grants permission to list task executions

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource (device or task)

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource
